title: SpaceX Reports $8 Billion Profit : Pre - IPO Surge Anticipated , ETTelecom
description: SpaceX IPO: In a landmark year, SpaceX announced a significant profit of $8 billion, highlighting its financial success ahead of a highly anticipated IPO. With Starlink as its main revenue driver, the company prepares for a historic public offering amidst discussions of a merger with xAI., SpaceX IPO: In a landmark year, SpaceX announced a significant profit of $8 billion, highlighting its financial success ahead of a highly anticipated IPO. With Starlink as its main revenue driver, the company prepares for a historic public offering amidst discussions of a merger with xAI.
content:
- [Satcom](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/satcom "") - 2 min read # SpaceX generated about $8 billion in profit last year ahead of IPO The profit figure was earnings ​before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization, a key measure of operating performance. Musk's satellite-based ‌internet system ‍Starlink is the main revenue driver, accounting for about 50% to ‍80% of the total, the people said. - [Reuters](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/agency/12345678/Reuters) - Published On Jan 31, 2026 at 08:19 AM IST - - Copy Link - Share on WhatsApp - Share on Linkedin - Share on X - Share on Telegram - Share on Facebook ![](https://st.etb2bimg.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/icon-share-arrow.png)![](https://st.etb2bimg.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/bookmark-icon-grey.svg?mod=2)![BookMark](https://st.etb2bimg.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/bookmarked-icon.svg)![Comment](https://st.etb2bimg.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/comment-icon.svg?mod=3129) - ![Twitter](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/twitter-share.svg?mod=2) - ![Whatsapp](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/whatsapp-share.svg) - ![Linkedin](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/linkedin-share.svg) - ![Telegram](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/telegram-share.svg) - ![Facebook](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/facebook-share.svg) - ![Copy Link](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/copy-icon.svg) **![
